mapper.select: SELECT A.AUTHOR_GRP_CODE , A.AUTHOR_GRP_NM , A.AUTHOR_GRP_DC , A.AUTHOR_GRP_CREAT_DT , A.CHANGE_DT , ifnull((SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM (SELECT AUTHOR_GRP_CODE FROM COMTNAUTHORUSR GROUP BY AUTHOR_GRP_CODE, USR_ID) AA WHERE AA.AUTHOR_GRP_CODE = A.AUTHOR_GRP_CODE),0) AS USRCNT , ifnull((SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM (SELECT AUTHOR_GRP_CODE FROM COMTNAUTHORGROUPAUTH GROUP BY AUTHOR_GRP_CODE, AUTHOR_CODE) BB WHERE BB.AUTHOR_GRP_CODE = A.AUTHOR_GRP_CODE),0) AS ATHCNT FROM COMTNAUTHORGROUPINFO A
SELECT AUTHOR_GRP_CODE , AUTHOR_GRP_NM , AUTHOR_GRP_DC , AUTHOR_GRP_CREAT_DT , CHANGE_DT FROM COMTNAUTHORGROUPINFO WHERE AUTHOR_GRP_CODE = '${AUTHGRPCD}'
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM COMTNAUTHORGROUPINFO WHERE AUTHOR_GRP_CODE = '${AUTHGRPCD}'
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNAUTHORGROUPINFO SET CHANGE_DT = '${DT}' , AUTHOR_GRP_NM = '${AUTHGRPNM}' , AUTHOR_GRP_DC = '${AUTHGRPDC}' WHERE AUTHOR_GRP_CODE = '${AUTHGRPCD}'
mapper.select: SELECT A.AUTHOR_GRP_CODE , A.AUTHOR_CODE , A.ADD_DT , B.AUTHOR_NM , B.AUTHOR_DC FROM COMTNAUTHORGROUPAUTH A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNAUTHORINFO B ON (A.AUTHOR_CODE = B.AUTHOR_CODE ) WHERE AUTHOR_GRP_CODE = '${AUTHGRPCD}'
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM COMTNAUTHORGROUPAUTH WHERE AUTHOR_GRP_CODE = '${AUTHGRPCD}' AND AUTHOR_CODE = '${AUTHCD}'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNAUTHORGROUPAUTH ( AUTHOR_GRP_CODE , AUTHOR_CODE , ADD_DT ) SELECT B.AUTHOR_GRP_CODE , A.AUTHOR_CODE , '${DT}' FROM COMTNAUTHORINFO a , COMTNAUTHORGROUPINFO b WHERE a.AUTHOR_CODE = '${AUTHCD}' AND b.AUTHOR_GRP_CODE = '${AUTHGRPCD}'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMTNAUTHORGROUPAUTH WHERE AUTHOR_GRP_CODE = '${AUTHGRPCD}' AND AUTHOR_CODE = '${AUTHCD}'
mapper.select: SELECT a.USR_ID , a.ADD_DT , b. USR_NM FROM COMTNAUTHORUSR a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNUSERMNG b ON a.USR_ID = b.USR_ID WHERE a.AUTHOR_GRP_CODE = '${AUTHGRPCD}' GROUP BY a.USR_ID
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM COMTNAUTHORGROUPAUTH WHERE AUTHOR_GRP_CODE = '${AUTHGRPCD}'
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNAUTHORUSR SET AUTHOR_GRP_CODE = '${AUTHGRPCD}' , ADD_DT = '${DT}' WHERE USR_ID = '${USRID}' AND AUTHOR_CODE IN (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE FROM COMTNAUTHORGROUPAUTH WHERE AUTHOR_GRP_CODE = '${AUTHGRPCD}' )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNAUTHORUSR SELECT AUTHOR_CODE , '${USRID}' , '${AUTHGRPCD}' , '${DT}' FROM COMTNAUTHORGROUPAUTH WHERE AUTHOR_CODE NOT IN (SELECT AUTHOR_CODE FROM COMTNAUTHORUSR WHERE USR_ID = '${USRID}' ) AND AUTHOR_GRP_CODE = '${AUTHGRPCD}'
mapper.select: SELECT USR_ID as "userId", USR_NM as "userNm", FROM COMTNUSERMNG
